info.description: The first global API for institutional data.
info.title: MESHUB

get.summary: API Key endpoint - requires X-MESHUB-ApiKey header
Admin endpoint - requires JWT access token with ADMIN role
Authenticated endpoint - requires JWT access token

post.description: Publishes a notification to all subscribers of a topic. Use 'user:{userId}' format for personal user topics.

externalDocs.description: Spring Boot Actuator Web API Documentation
